column4: hey .. it's my my third day . in linux ! is there any channel for newbies ? :p
not a particular one. but we're happy to help with any ubuntu problems. there is also ##linux
thX .. and my first prb : i'm using ubuntu classic mode 11.04 with compiz .so if  i upgrade to 11.10 will i lose the compiz config ,.if not:will it work fine with ubuntu11.10?
correct. you can only update to the next ubuntu version or lts version and never skip versions in between
